chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: Hi everyone, welcome to supreme batch.

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: You have completed your first step and now you have become a part of supreme deaf family.

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: The next 5 months are going to be very interesting.

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: We are going to learn a lot of things.

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: You will have a lot of questions in your mind that what topics are we going to study?

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: How many classes are going to be there?

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: What will you teach in the first class?

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: And what classes are we going to give?

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: Whatever the homework will be, we will get the recorded solution of all of them.

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: TA support should also be there.

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: And the groups will be on telegram, discord, slack.

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: Where will they be?

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: How many questions are you going to get in the overall course in 5 months?

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: Are those questions so good that you will be able to crack the placement?

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: I said it will be a lot of fun.

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: One thing you have to keep is patience.

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: Our orientation class is going to be on 22nd January after 3 days.

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: Where all the answers to all these questions will be given to you.

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: The whole flow will be explained and you will have a lot of fun.

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: All the announcements related to our DSA course will be available on this dashboard.

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: If there is anything additional, then you will be given a mail.

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: And in the first class, that is, the orientation class, you will be given a link to the discord server.

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: You will join and you will study with the whole community.

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: It will be a lot of fun.

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: Welcome to supreme batch.

chhunks.title: Welcome to @Supreme Batch (1) (1)
chhunks.text: Thank you.

text: Hi everyone, welcome to supreme batch. You have completed your first step and now you have become a part of supreme deaf family. The next 5 months are going to be very interesting. We are going to learn a lot of things. You will have a lot of questions in your mind that what topics are we going to study? How many classes are going to be there? What will you teach in the first class? And what classes are we going to give? Whatever the homework will be, we will get the recorded solution of all of them. TA support should also be there. And the groups will be on telegram, discord, slack. Where will they be? How many questions are you going to get in the overall course in 5 months? Are those questions so good that you will be able to crack the placement? I said it will be a lot of fun. One thing you have to keep is patience. Our orientation class is going to be on 22nd January after 3 days. Where all the answers to all these questions will be given to you. The whole flow will be explained and you will have a lot of fun. All the announcements related to our DSA course will be available on this dashboard. If there is anything additional, then you will be given a mail. And in the first class, that is, the orientation class, you will be given a link to the discord server. You will join and you will study with the whole community. It will be a lot of fun. Welcome to supreme batch. Thank you.
